sentence: But during his tenure he has lifted Georgia to place it hasnt been since Vince Dooley landed Herschel Walker in the spring of 1980 and won a national championship and three SEC championships in a row.
author: Chip Towers
title: Once again, Alabama stands in Georgias path to glory

sentence: The Bulldogs (14-1) hadnt won a national title since freshman Herschel Walker led them there in 1980.

title: Georgia outlasts Alabama for 1st national title in 41 years

sentence: The Bulldogs (14-1) hadnt won a national title since freshman Herschel Walker led them there in 1980.

sentence: Bulldog fans were stuck viewing YouTube clips starring Herschel Walker.

title: Mighty Georgia runs down Bama to claim its long-sought championship

sentence: The Bulldogs' last national title came more than four decades ago when freshman running back Herschel Walker guided them to a 12-0 record and a Sugar Bowl win over Notre Dame.

title: Georgia tops Alabama in College Football Playoff for 1st national title since 1980

sentence: This version of the USFL is not directly linked to the USFL that existed from 1983 to 1985 and managed to sign several marquee players who would eventually go on to star in the NFL, including Steve Young, Herschel Walker, Reggie White, Jim Kelly and Doug Flutie.
title: Jeff Fisher returns to pro football as a head coach in the fledgling USFL

sentence: That predecessor launched the professional football careers of Heisman Trophy winners like Herschel Walker and Doug Flutie, and future Hall of Famers like Reggie White, Jim Kelly and Steve Young.
title: The U.S.F.L. Isnt Back. The U.S.F.L. Is Here.
